body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, and thank you for contacting Car Solutions. My name is Richard Morgan. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my name is Madison Price.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. Can you please provide me with the last four digits of your phone number and the model year of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number ends in seven one two four, and my vehicle is from the year two zero one eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have noted that down. Is there anything else you would like to share about the billing issue you mentioned earlier?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I provided all the necessary details earlier, and I'm feeling relieved that it's being looked into.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that, Madison. Your case is important to us, and we'll do our best to resolve it. Thank you for your time today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Richard. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome. Have a great day, Madison. Goodbye.
